title: François Borde
text: François Borde (8 December 1899 – 15 December 1987) was a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who competed in the <a href="1920%20Summer%20Olympics">1920 Summer Olympics</a>. He was born in <a href="Lourdes">Lourdes</a> and died in <a href="Bayonne">Bayonne</a>. In 1920 he won the silver medal as member of the French team.
